text: 8|54|Phira'a'unara bansadhara arau sihamtara purbarartisakalara abhyasara darae ihamte nija pratipalakara ayatasamuhaka asbikara karaichila. Phalata sihamtara papakarmara babe ami sihamtaka dhbansa karaicho arau phira'a'unara bansadharasakalaka duba'i maraicho; arau sihamta ataye achila yalima.
